mapper.insert: insert into READER_CHANNEL (id, creator, create_date, deleted, picking_status, picking_batch_no, picking_amount, picking_count, url, name, description) values (#{id}, #{creator}, #{createDate}, #{deleted}, #{pickingStatus}, #{pickingBatchNo}, #{pickingAmount}, #{pickingCount}, #{url}, #{name}, #{description} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from READER_CHANNEL where deleted = '0' and creator = #{creator}
select * from READER_CHANNEL where deleted = '0' and creator = #{creator} order by create_date desc
mapper.update: update READER_CHANNEL set last_modifier = #{lastModifier}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate}, deleted = #{deleted}, picking_status = #{pickingStatus}, picking_count = #{pickingCount} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from READER_CHANNEL where deleted = '0' and picking_status = #{pickingStatus} order by create_date asc limit 1
select * from READER_CHANNEL where deleted = '0' and picking_batch_no = #{pickingBatchNo} order by create_date asc limit 1
